alert.note: Alert for Eastern San Gabriel Mountains (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 05 at 11:00AM PST until January 06 at 7:00AM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 4 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 7 AM PST SATURDAY... ...HIGH WIND WATCH IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY EVENING THROUGH SUNDAY EVENING... * WHAT...For the Wind Advisory, northeast winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 45 mph expected. For the High Wind Watch, northwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 60 to 70 mph expected, with isolated gusts to 80 mph possible. * WHERE...Eastern San Gabriel Mountains. * WHEN...For the Wind Advisory, from 4 PM this afternoon to 7 AM PST Saturday. For the High Wind Watch, from Saturday evening through Sunday evening. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds could blow down large objects such as trees and power lines. Power outages are possible. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.
